summary:
Adds new weapons to the Mainhall in Jorrvaskr. Up to now there are axes, swords and maces....others are in work.

Fügt dem Spiel neue Waffen für Draugr und 3 neue Schilde hinzu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#999999][b][font=Arial][size=6][/size][/font][/b][/color][/center][center][color=#999999][b][font=Arial][size=6][/size][/font][/b][/color][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][u][img]http://images2.imagebam.com/d2/c9/c9/e97afd883519274.png[/img]﻿
[/u]
[/size][size=2][u][url=http://www.elderscrollsportal.de/themen/draugr-weaponry.52554/#post-1053343]D[i][/i][/url][i][url=http://www.elderscrollsportal.de/themen/draugr-weaponry.52554/#post-1053343]eutsche Beschreibung[/url][/i][/u][/size][/font][i][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][/size][/font][/font][/i][i]


[/i][font=Georgia][b]Translations
[/b][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74756?][color=#5ea2e5][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=4][b]Spanish [/b][/size][/font][/color][color=#5ea2e5][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=2][b]Translation by DurzoBlint[/b][/size][/font][/color][/url][color=#5ea2e5][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=2]
[/size][/font][/color]
[u][b][i]______________________________________________________________________[/i][/b][/u]

[b][i][font=Georgia][size=6]Changelog [/size]
[/font][/i][/b][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3]
[/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][spoiler]
[font=Georgia][size=3][color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][i]V.2.0 - V. 2.01.................................... [/i][/size][/font][/color][color=#ffffff][font=Arial][size=3][b]added 3 twohanded warhammers 
                                             for both versions
[/b][/size][/font][/color][color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]V.2.01 - V. 2.02...................................corrected Nif-Data for better        
                                                       placement in the Inventar

V. 2.02 - V.2.03...................................added 3 onehanded hammers        

   V. 2.03 - V.2.04...................................missing levellists have been added!

V. 2.04 - V.2.04FIX...............................Shields fixed, female characters  
                                      wear them now

V. 2.04FIX - V.2.04.1.............................Still some fixing here and there    
[/b][/size][/font][/color][color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][u][b]
[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]V.2.04.1 - V. 2.04.1FIX...........................FIXES the warhammer V. 3            
                                                    which can be placed in 
                                                      a weaponrack now! Also 
                                                     changes the designation 
                                                                            of one Greatsword to the propper one

            V. 2.04.1FIX - V.2.05..............................In preparation of the SSE Edition i updated
[/b][/size][/font][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]                                                                                  this version aswell version aswell, which [/b]
[b]                                                                                         means i erased a few weapons, which didn 't [/b]
[b]                                                                                        really fit in and some i replaced with better [/b]
[b]                                          fitting versions.[/b]
[color=#f4f4f4][b]
                     V. 2.05 - V.2.06.....................................[/b]Some Weapons have been reworked, some have 
                                                                                            been added and in addition all swords have blood-
                                                               textures when used in combat!
[/color]
[b][b][color=#00ff00]              [/color]        V. 2.06 - V.2.061...................................The before in CK2 created mod has been resaved
                                                                                              in CK1, due to concerns the CK2-ESP may harm the
                                 playthrough. 
[/b][/b][b]                                                                                                 Also some of the bloodtextures have been readjusted [/b]
[b]                                          to avoid flickering![/b]

[color=#00ff00]             [/color]    V. 2.061 - V.2.062..................................[b]Only the Standalone[/b] Version has been changed!
                                                                                         Issue with invisible greatswords has been solved!

[color=#00ff00]              [/color]  V. 2.061 - V.2.064..................................[b]Only the Replacer[/b] Version has been changed!
                                                                                              The Nordherosword got the more modern blade of the 
                                                                                                standard Nord-Steelsword now and the draugr-axe got
                                             a wraped gripp now!

[color=#00ff00]               V. 2.064 - V.2.065..................................[/color][color=#ffe599][b]Only the Replacer[/b] Version[/color][color=#00ff00] has been changed,
                                                      just some small corrections[/color]
[/size][/font][/size][/font]

[/spoiler][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#00ff00][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]               
[/b][/size][/font][/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-abUtRbUS_U][color=#5ea2e5][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]Here is a hint were to search the Dwemer-Weapons!!!
[/b][/size][/font][/color][/url]Download under Miscellaneous
[/size][/font][u][b][i]___________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/i][/b][/u][size=3]Grab the version, that suits you most [/size]
[size=3]and please [/size][font=Georgia][color=#00ff00][size=5][b][i]endorce[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font] [font=Lucida Sans Unicode]and [/font][font=Georgia][color=#00ff00][size=5][b][i]comment[/i][/b] [/size][/color][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]if you like it! Also[/font][size=5][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] [/font][color=#00ff00][b][i]share your pics[/i][/b][/color][/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][i],[/i][/b] [/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]i 'd like to seem them :)
[/font]

[size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Videos by [/font][b][i][font=Georgia]Slothability[/font][/i][/b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode] and [/font][b][i][font=Georgia]Shinji72[/font][/i][/b]
Thank you guys :)
[/size]
[spoiler]
[b][youtube]aFNjUp5Wo0k[/youtube][/b]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wWdO3G0FBew][youtube]wWdO3G0FBew[/youtube][/url]
[font=Georgia][size=6][u][b][i][/spoiler]

Recommended
[b][i][font=Georgia][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74217/?][color=#6fa8dc][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3]DraugrHorrific Textures by [/size][/font][/color][color=#6fa8dc][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3][b]grVulture[/b][/size][/font][/color][color=#6fa8dc][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif][size=3] [/size][/font][/color][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74217/?][img]http://axxis.gr/images/SKYRIM/draugr-banner.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif]This mod retextures the Draugr really well and makes them even more creepy![/font][/color][/size][/font][/i][/b]

Thanks and Credits!

[/i][/b][/u][/size][/font][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=6][/size][/color][/b][/center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6880601?tab=about+me][center][b][color=#6fa8dc][size=6]TO PADL  [/size][/color][/b][/center][center][color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]for helping me to add the Steelsword blade of the standard nord-steel-sword
to the nord-hero-sword, to make it look much better![/b][/size][/color][/center][/url][center][color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b][/b][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62899/?][b][size=5]BIG THANX TO VALADORN 
[/size][size=4]for his inspiration and his mod to learn from![/size]

[/b][/url]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62602/?][size=5]TO MAYORMODDER
[/size] [size=4]for giving permission to use his 
"Ancient Draugr Shield" in my mod![/size][/url][size=4][/size][/b]

[b]
[size=5][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/776954/?][size=5]TO TAMIRA 
[/size][size=4]for helping me with 
nifscope MANY TIMES!

[/size][/url][size=4]And finally, but not least of course, 
my favorite youtubers 
[/size][size=5][/size][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ1nSWwpGdWljL96pBQpBxw][size=5]SHINJi72[/size][size=4] [/size][/url][size=4][/size][size=4]and [/size][size=5][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/Slothability]SLOTHABILITY[/url][/size][size=4] 
for showcasing this mod![/size][/b]

[b][size=5][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/65157-1-1430346280.gif[/img]
[/size][/b][b]If you like this Seal you can download it [size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/568/?]here[/url][/size]

[/b][/center]
